segments.text: Why did you apply for the position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I learned from your ad.That you will provide on-the-job training for new employees.This is just what I need , because I'm a recent college graduate . I have the necessary knowledge and skills but I lack experience .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you hope to become ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to prove my true value in the electronic industry , and hopefully in the near future I would be promoted to a higher position .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , thank you for coming.We ' ll let you know as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S1
